entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 8.
